title: Must I wear hijab & niqab in front of a 12 year old boy (non mahram) #Assim #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: shik there is a 12-year-old boy who came to stay with us he's nonam because his parents went to Hajj I'm wearing Abaya and hijab in front of him do I also have to wear nikab well it is best for you to stay away from because lots of the boys reach the age of puberty around that age so definitely if he has reached the age of puberty it is mandatory upon you to wear the nikab and if he did not it is highly recommended that you do wear the nikab and Allah Knows Best
